chapter.title: Creating a Managed System Distribution Development and Deployment Environment Using SystemBuilder
chapter.para: You can harness SystemBuilder's architecture and features to create a production software development environment with reusable components for the distribution definition file, version tracking for that and other configuration files, expedited testing procedures and alternate publish and download locations. Using SystemBuilder as part of a long-term deployment and shop management strategy will enable you to be more efficient and provide an system distribution development and deployment history that is repeatable and predictable.
